# Security
If you discover a security vulnerability in this repository, [**email me directly**](#contact) and do not submit a
public issue.

## Supported versions
In general, only the most recent major version is supported. However, exceptions will be made on a case-by-case basis.
If you're unsure, it's best to [email me](#contact) and I will work with you to find a good solution.

## Contact
To report a security vulnerability or voice your concern, you may email <security@svenluijten.com>.
